features: Value 6 Pack: 2 x White, 2 x Light Grey, 2 x Khaki Assorted. Weighing 60g and approximately 5.5 inches wide, each shower sponge is perfect for most adults and children's hands and bodies, meeting the colour preferences of men, women & families and making it easy to distinguish. You will be in a good mood when you see these lovely colours.
Tighter Knots: We know that many brands of bath sponges fall out after a few uses, so we use triple knot technology, which significantly improves the strength and durability of each sponge core.
Really Lathers: The fluffy, high quality material used in our loofah sponge is not only beautiful, it holds up well and produces great lather while bathing.

Long Lanyard for Storage: The bath sponge comes with a long and strong lanyard that fits perfectly on your bathroom hangers or door hooks. The design of the soft lanyard makes you feel free from any foreign body when using it, it will not fall apart easily, works perfectly with your towel rack. Rinse thoroughly and hang to dry after each use.
100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you are not 100% satisfied with shower sponge, please feel free to contact our customer service. We will provide the best solution to you within 24 hours.
description: Product Description Skin-Friendly and Soft Material Lifeforce shower sponge is made from Recycled Materials, 60gram per one. Super soft but dense and doesn't leave any scratch marks on your body, suitable for men and women bathing. Health and safe to use, three-layer bundling, not easy to fall apart, so you can use this shower sponge for a long time. ✔5.5" Large Shower Sponge, 6x 60G Mixed Colour Puffs✔ Perfectly integrated into your bathroom 3 Different Colors Bath Shower Sponges Package List: 2x Light gray 2x White 2x Khaki Creating Rich Bubble Bath scrub exfoliating sponge for soapy shower fun. There are small dense mesh on the mesh bath ball. You will get abundant lather with a little shower gel or soap. The rich suds help you remove exfoliates and clean pores.
